website_summaries.verdict: Place this karaoke machine on the ground or a tabletop and let your child show their full range of skills with a machine designed specifically for them.
pros: Comes with fun voice effects to keep a child's attention
Also comes with memory so they can show off their artistic performance
Finally, it has two microphones included — meaning your child can include a friend or family member for those songs that are just begging for a duet
Setting it up is incredibly easy
cons: Doesn't feature songs that are great for singalongs
Requires C batteries that don't come with the unit

customer_reviews.title: Great! Until the microphones broke 😕
customer_reviews.text: My girls (2 & 5) loved this karaoke machine (and my husband and I did too!) until the microphones wires broke off in the machine. See picture. 😕 Such a bummer. This was a Christmas gift and we used it maybe 6 times. Why aren’t these more robust/stronger for young kids?! And can we get replacements?!
customer_reviews.author: hlp

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids lovvvve this!!! They love the voice changers, and having two microphones with two young kids is great! (Ages 4 & 2) No fighting over a microphone! Definitely recommend! Connects with Bluetooth on my phone and plays music with great quality. It was actually louder than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our nearly 5 year old granddaughter but had no her little sister would love it too. This is a well constructed toy - not cheaply made and the sound quality is very good. You can play your own music through the system so the kids can sing a long. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: So much fun, Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit, not only with my kiddos, but my older niece and nephew got into the action on Christmas day. It connects via Bluetooth to your phone, tablet, etc. My kids have even used it as a speaker when they just want to listen to their music. This was definitely a crowd pleaser. The voice changing is a riot. This will bring countless hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi W.

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware- you’re kids will LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Kids LOVE- Volume can go up quite a ways making it a little less adult friendly (haha). Very nice that it comes with 2 mics and the top can be removed, making it portable. With Bluetooth, I was able to connect to an iPad Air 2.
customer_reviews.author: melm

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Unit was dead on arrival however I saw the lights briefly turn on once. In putting it together I realized there are additional shortcomings such as not being able to loosen or tighten the knobs to adjust the height as the knobs don’t actually turn the screws that need to tighten when you turn them. Both of them where like this. Called the company and they do answer the phone and will warranty up to 90 days but require more prework than Amazon so returning and getting something else.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkigrad

customer_reviews.title: Terrific singing machine for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my 2 year old grandson. He has an older brother, so the two microphones make this perfect for sharing time singing together. Bluetooth connection works fine, easy to use. They’ve only had it for two days, so we’ll see how it holds up over time, but for now I have to say that this was an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had it long but it's been a hit with the kids and seems to be better quality than other kids karaoke machines on the market
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely, hands down, one of the best gifts our kids have received. The sound quality is great. The bluetooth connects very quickly and the two mics are perfect for family karaoke nights. The lights are fun, the voice disguises were hilarious to the kids, and the volume adjusts very well. The set up was a breeze and I love that it's portable-perfect for road trips! I actually read a book to my kids using the mic and they were even more captivated as it gave a theatrical element to storytime.
customer_reviews.author: amazonmommy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for two of my nieces, 2 and 1 years old. Set up out of the box was very simple. You can connect via bluetooth or aux cord. It has some voice changer options and a flashing lights. The two included mic's were a Godsend so the girls didn't have to fight over it. It was the most popular xmas gift. Funny enough, once the kids were asleep, we adults had our crack at it and I think it's the gift that keeps on giving. I would completely recommend this item. Well worth the price (which isn't bad itself).
customer_reviews.author: JAY

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: This is lots of fun but after some time, one of the microphones quit working. My granddaughters didn't want to give it up so I bought them a different style - now they use both!
customer_reviews.author: suemc

customer_reviews.title: Broken microphone
customer_reviews.text: One of the microphones came broken. I have 2 kids this was a birthday gift. Loved to but needless to say big fight over the working microphone.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Really cool product for little kids
customer_reviews.text: You can synch your phone easily with the bluetooth button and it is great for 2 kids to use and sing at the same time. Good quality and great product for the price. The pedestal helps to keep it off the ground - better than ground based ones in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Graucho

customer_reviews.title: Microphone broke after 3-4 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to get this for my twin 5 yr olds for their birthday. Unfortunately, one of the microphones broke after only 3-4 uses. Amazon attempted to send a replacement microphone that isn’t compatible. After that, I was outside of my return window and given the contact info for the seller. No response from them and no way to use the product without a replacement mic. Very disappointed. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite
customer_reviews.text: Daughter and friends have so much fun with this. However the volume doesn’t get that loud.
customer_reviews.author: brittany gummo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this microphone stand! They use it all the time, it’s easy to put together and easy enough for my 2(almost 3) year old to know how to work it. I especially love that it comes with two microphones so that both of my kids can sing together at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren love this item
customer_reviews.text: The karaoke was very easy to assemble. The grandchildren love singing on this machine. I would recommend it. It's a great gift for children.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Apparently my sister is getting more use out of it than her kids about a week into corona quarantine. Knowing that her in-laws recently moved in with her and that I’m a few thousand miles away is at least as entertaining as whatever crap I’m binge watching right now.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Ward

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: I think I have more fun with it then my kiddos. Very load. Connected with my Bluetooth no problem. Seems pretty tough. It’s been knocked over a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Best gift purchase for my Toddlers! 😁😁😁
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old daughter and 5 yr old son use their amazon fire tablet to sing alone their favorite videos. They love, loce this machine! It is he best Christmas purchase I made 😁
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This was PERFECT! With the Bluetooth pairing it makes it sooo toddler friendly. It gets loud so it’s perfect for a party. Literally the ideal product I couldn’t find a flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was a slow talker and is very shy. When her dad put this together...something came alive in her. She sings for hours now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughters love this. Works perfectly. Glad it's at their house though.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L.

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for the kiddos!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great machine but buy ear plugs because your kids will blast the volume!!! We love this.
customer_reviews.author: MiaSofia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kids toy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What I loved about this product was my grandkids Christmas morning singing and dancing like they were rock stars! At the same time that is also what I dislike about this, too loud LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Jukebox

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough for children.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this product. Used it a few times and both microphones fell apart. Too late to return or I would. My daughter was heartbroken bc it was supposed to be so great.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Reinhold

customer_reviews.title: No sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound does not work on the product I received, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michell

customer_reviews.title: So cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been having so much fun with this! I didn’t realize when purchasing that it had sound effects and Bluetooth so I can play karaoke music for her!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This has been a 100% hit in our household. Super easy to set up and the kids LOVE using it:)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K Turner

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure who plays with it more, the parents or the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I really love this karaoke so does my 3 year old daughter . It so easy to use for her.
customer_reviews.author: Francheska

customer_reviews.title: Two mikes are necessary for twins!
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough for 4 year olds to use on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Nocookhere

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: The microphone jacks a terribly designed. They snapped off inside within two days of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Mrozo

customer_reviews.title: really like it! lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: we love it! lots of options and 2 microphones are great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Microphone stopped to work after few hours
customer_reviews.text: Microphone stopped to work few hours after we opened it? It was not expected at all,,
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old granddaughter on her birthday and she absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth Poirrier

customer_reviews.title: Broken mic
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy, but within an hour of using the second microphone stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: After assembly it is virtually impossible to place back in the original box. The volume does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Sigmon

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it!! Pairing with blue tooth is easy too!
customer_reviews.author: reneemd

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Great karaoke machine for my 4 year old daughter. Easily connects to tablet, phone, and ipod.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R.

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present for our Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: The karaoke machine was a wonderful gift for our 4 year old grand daughter. She loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old and 5 yr old grandkids loved it as well as the adults.
customer_reviews.author: Jane SaNders

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has two microphones so kids can use it with siblings. It's nice for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids loved it but broke easily
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months one of the microphones plug broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Ip

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love playing with this and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Hill

product_meta.title: Singing Machine Kid's Pedestal Kids Karaoke System with Stand (SMK1010)
product_meta.description: A karaoke machine for future super-stars! This karaoke system will grow with your little singer with adjustable height from 26 inches to 36 inches high. It’s also ready for shows on the road with its detachable main unit. Transform voices with 6 fun voice-changing effects! Built-in memory allow to easily record and playback performances. Connect via Bluetooth or line-in and secure devices safely in the non-skid device holder! Operates with included extra-long power adapter or with 4 C batteries (not included). Create joy through music with the Singing Machine’s Kid Pedestal! Included in the box: Kid Pedestal SMK1010, 2 wired microphones and AC adapter.
feature_bullets: Adjustable height karaoke machine that also detaches for tabletop use
Six Voice-Changing Effects: Echo, Male, Female, Robot, Chipmunk and Radio
Memory to Record and playback performances; Auto Shut Off
Connect via Bluetooth or line-in and secure devices safely in non-skid device holder
2 microphones included for duets. Dedicated microphone volume

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars180 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
